quest.name: Moghan's Trial
journal: Moghan would test your trustworthiness with a trial.

You speak with Moghan, one of the three trial-givers named by Moglin, and the moogle alchemist bids you gather a special ingredient for his potions. Search the vicinity of Eil Tohm and collect three sprigs of cloudsbreath.
You have plucked three sprigs of the delicate white flower. Return to Moghome, and deliver them to the waiting Moghan.
You hand over the sprigs of cloudsbreath to an appreciative Moghan. The alchemist claims that the flower is the main ingredient in a tonic that restores bounce to even the floppiest pom.
objectives: Deliver the sprigs of cloudsbreath to Moghan.

dialogue.name: MOGHAN
dialogue.text: Hello! Yes, I am Moghan─the foremost alchemist in Moghome, if you must know!

dialogue.name: MOGHAN
dialogue.text: If your tummy's gloopy or your wings're droopy, I've a potion to fix that!

dialogue.name: MOGHAN
dialogue.text: Or, I would if I didn't keep running out of ingredients. Luckily, you're here to do my chore─ Er, trial! Yes! Go forth, mighty adventurer, and mightily pluck three sprigs of cloudsbreath for me!

dialogue.name: MOGHAN
dialogue.text: You'll find it blooming near the entrance to Eil Tohm. It's not the safest of places, so don't let yourself be too distracted by the pretty flowers, kupo!

dialogue.name: MOGHAN
dialogue.text: Pick three sprigs of cloudsbreath─that is your trial. Simple enough, kupo?

dialogue.name: MOGHAN
dialogue.text: Just pay attention to the denizens near Eil Tohm. They're not exactly, um, friendly!

dialogue.name: MOGHAN
dialogue.text: Did you have any trouble finding cloudsbreath? I do need it quite urgently, you know...

dialogue.name: MOGHAN
dialogue.text: Oh, yes, these are perfect, kupo! Now I have the main ingredient for my pom tonic.

dialogue.name: MOGHAN
dialogue.text: ...Speaking of which, how are you feeling, misssir? Should you ever feel your pom losing its bounce, then I'm your moogle, kupo!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You have completed the Trials of Trustworthiness. Return to Chieftain Moglin and await his judgment.
